live_updates: Technicians have identified the source of the issue but are unable to proceed with work due to safety concerns in the area. Work will continue throughout the day, and we thank you for your continued patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
53131.summary: Some customers in Jasper are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53131.title: Sept 5 - Jasper | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
53133.summary: Some customers in the Rutherford area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53133.title: Sept 5 - Edmonton (Rutherford) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
